name: Skuid
overview:
Your all-in-one interface toolkit for the Salesforce Platform. Drag-and-drop to create tables, calendars, Chatter feeds, images, or wizards on any page. Combine data from different apps. Create a gorgeous, more useful and powerful Ui with ease. You can do it all with Skuid.

Cut Ui development time and costs in half. Improve user productivity and satisfaction dramatically. Reduce support and training costs. Includes everything you need to build and deploy pages.

COMPONENTS include:

FIELD EDITOR: Build multicolumn, multisection forms with in-line editing.

TAB SET: Create sets of tabs and subtabs to keep information above the fold.

TABLE: Create fully, inline-editable tables with totals, averages, multicolumn sorting and mass actions.

SEARCH: Filter and sort any table by multiple criteria, including custom filters.

CALENDAR: Insert a calendar on any page to display time-stamped data.

PANEL SET: Organize and size components within flexible panel sections.

FILE: Upload, replace or delete images or files from any page layout.

CHATTER FEED: Include Chatter features in any app or layout.

WIZARD: Add process workflow to your forms and pages.

PAGE TITLE: Title a page with any selected field automatically.

PAGE INCLUDE: Insert other Skuid or Visualforce pages into Skuid pages.

TEMPLATE: Create merge-field areas without writing formulas.

CUSTOM: Add custom javascript snippets.

Also:

PAGE ASSIGNMENTS: Deploy different versions of pages by profile or record type.

RESOURCES: Create your own custom components, labels or CSS without leaving Skuid.
